comment.author: 25564641@N08
comment._content: I remember the Florida anti-Communist curriculum very well and Mr. Hoover's book "A Study of Communism." I wish to thank him for my questioning everything as his extremism was too much to take. I traveled the Iron Curtain as a result and also made a study of the Communist world. Pathological anti-Communism ruled south Florida for years and no one questioned who was actually controlling whom. The rabid anti-Castro crew held us all hostage just as others such as the "China Lobby." Americans are really subject to this kind of ideological blindness.
